title: Chroma packs not working in new ranked lobby
body: Yeah i love the new lobby for draft and have no issues with it other then when i am playing my {{champion:89}}  support i cant select the chroma pack that i shelled out money for can you please fix this or refund me my chroma skin with RP ty.

replies.body:
Hey silverreign,

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue with the new Champion Select and we're working on a fix!
